comment: Value of the named sinh function. Here we show the simple conversion to the conventional form used in set.mm, using the definition given by ~ df-sinh . See ~ sinhval for a theorem to convert this further. See ~ sinh-conventional for a justification that our definition is the same as the conventional definition of sinh used in other sources. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Apr-2015.)
